name: home-assignment-algo
description: Ride assignment algorithm with greedy and min-cost flow strategies

scripts.start: npm run clean && npm run build:only && node dist/cli.js --drivers data/sample-drivers.json --rides data/sample-rides.json
scripts.start:greedy: npm run clean && npm run build:only && node dist/cli.js --drivers data/sample-drivers.json --rides data/sample-rides.json --strategy greedy
scripts.start:mincost: npm run clean && npm run build:only && node dist/cli.js --drivers data/sample-drivers.json --rides data/sample-rides.json --strategy mincost
scripts.start:with-deadhead: npm run clean && npm run build:only && node dist/cli.js --drivers data/sample-drivers.json --rides data/sample-rides.json --includeDeadheadTime --includeDeadheadFuel
scripts.test:all: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration && npm run test:performance
